reviews.review_msg: The class was not what it was described as it changed from the idea of being about publication and how sensitive material was published in a conservative time to a class about multimedia. Had many classes about podcasts and blogging instead of learning about the actual topic. Left the class with no new knowledge about the topic.

Colette was the best prof I've ever had at SFU. Took this 4th year class with her, and the assignments were different from the standard paper writing other classes force you to do. The amount of reading was adequate for the course we were taking, and the class interaction was superb. She was very personable and helpful.
